name: Mental Health Triage Team
description: San Francisco clients are evaluated by our specialized Triage Coordinators, who provide an initial evaluation in the local inpatient hospitals and jail settings. The Triage Coordinator acts as an advocate which ensures that clients who may benefit from our services have an effective option to avoid involuntary hospitalization. Assessment, Triage and Advocacy: Clients in San Francisco work through the Mental Health Triage coordinator to manage referrals and perform any necessary triage services.

howToGetIt: For referrals or information, please call (415) 722-1983.
